pitchtools.suggest_clef¶

abjad.tools.pitchtools.suggest_clef(pitches, clefs=[, 'treble', 'bass'])¶

Suggest best clef for pitches determined by the least number of leger lines required to notate all pitches on a single staff.

abjad> pitches = [Pitch(x) for x in (-30, 10, 20)]
abjad> pitchtools.suggest_clef(pitches)
Clef('bass')

abjad> pitches = [Pitch(x) for x in (-5, 30)]
abjad> pitchtools.suggest_clef(pitches)
Clef('treble')
